Generation In 5 Minutes

Apache Whisker generates licensing documentation (for example, LICENSE and NOTICE documents) from meta-data.

Describe Your Project

Describe your project in a meta-data document, and save as descriptor.xml in the project directory.

TODO

Configure Apache Whisker Plugin4Maven

  ...
  <build>
    <plugins>
        ...
        <plugin>
          <groupId>org.apache.creadur.whisker</groupId>
            <artifactId>apache-whisker-plugin4maven</artifactId>
            <version>0.1-SNAPSHOT</version>
            <executions>
                <execution>
                    <id>generate-licensing-docs</id>
                    <phase>package</phase>
                    <goals>
                        <goal>generate</goal>
                    </goals>
                </execution>
            </executions>
            <configuration>
                <descriptor>descriptor.xml</descriptor>
            </configuration>
        </plugin>
        ...
    </plugins>
  </build>
  ...
